comments:
I added to CVSROOT/modules a module definition that was invalid. The following 
NPE occurred when trying to expand it. The relevant definitions were as 
follows.

moduleA a
moduleB b
test &moduleA &moduleB
test2 &a &b
ptplace-all a &test &test2 

The exception was

java.lang.NullPointerException
at 
org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.core.client.AbstractStructureVisitor$1.compare
(AbstractStructureVisitor.java:227)
at java.util.Arrays.mergeSort(Arrays.java:1237)
at java.util.Arrays.mergeSort(Arrays.java:1245)
at java.util.Arrays.mergeSort(Arrays.java:1245)
at java.util.Arrays.sort(Arrays.java:1185)
at java.util.Collections.sort(Collections.java:151)
at org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.core.client.AbstractStructureVisitor.visit
(AbstractStructureVisitor.java:221)
at 
org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.core.client.AbstractMessageCommand.sendLocalReso
urceState(AbstractMessageCommand.java:31)
at org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.core.client.Command.doExecute
(Command.java:392)
at org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.core.client.Command$1.run(Command.java:337)
at org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.core.resources.RemoteFolder.run
(RemoteFolder.java:481)
